messages.content: **Objective Simplified:**       Support AloAi, the AI dental clinic receptionist, by executing actions based on customer interactions. Analyze conversation transcripts to determine when and what tasks are needed.      **Simplified Guidelines for Function Execution:**            1. **Understanding Your Role:**         - Your job is to act behind the scenes, assisting AloAi by performing specific tasks as conversations with customers unfold.            2. **Function Execution Basics:**         - **No Task Identified:** If AloAi doesn't specify a task, remain idle with a "nothing" status.
{AloAi: Hi there, thank you for calling Forbes I T. How can I help you today?}
nothing
{Caller: Hi there. Um, can you transfer me to sales, please?}
{AloAi: Sure, may I have your name and phone number for the transfer?}
nothing
{Caller: My name is Matthew, and my phone number is the 1 that I called you with.}
{AloAi: Great, let me transfer you to Sales. One moment please.}

functions.name: redirect_call
functions.description: Redirects the call to the requested department.

phoneNumber.description:
The phone number for the call to be redirected to.  
 Support: +16043994002
 Sales: +17789179291

functions.name: hangup
functions.description: Hangs up the call once the conversation is fully concluded and AloAi says 'Goodbye' or 'Have a great day'. Should not be called in any other circumstances unless conversation is fully concluded. Can also be trigerred after 5 ' CALLER_NOT_TALKING ' messages.

functions.name: open_halopsa_ticket
functions.description: Opens a ticket for the caller after AloAi announces the ticket has successfully been opened.

Analyze conversation transcripts to determine when and what tasks are needed.      **Simplified Guidelines for Function Execution:**            1. **Understanding Your Role:**         - Your job is to act behind the scenes, assisting AloAi by performing specific tasks as conversations with customers unfold.            2. **Function Execution Basics:**         - **No Task Identified:** If AloAi doesn't specify a task, remain idle with a "nothing" status.
{AloAi: Hi there, thank you for calling Forbes I T. How can I help you today?}
nothing
{Caller: Hey there. Um, can you transfer me to support, please?}

nothing

{AloAi: Great, let me transfer you to support. One moment please.}

messages.content: **Objective Simplified:**       Support AloAi, the AI dental clinic receptionist, by executing actions based on customer interactions. Analyze conversation transcripts to determine when and what tasks are needed.      **Simplified Guidelines for Function Execution:**            1. **Understanding Your Role:**         - Your job is to act behind the scenes, assisting AloAi by performing specific tasks as conversations with customers unfold.            2. **Function Execution Basics:**         - **No Task Identified:** If AloAi doesn't specify a task, remain idle with a "nothing" status.
{AloAi: Hi there, thank you for calling Forbes I T. How can I help you today?}
nothing
{Caller: Hey there. Tracker is down.}
{AloAi: Oh okay, Let's go through the ticket process}
{AloAi: So can you give more details on what's going on with tracker?}
nothing
{Caller: It stopped working suddenly and I cannot login.}
{AloAi: Oh okay, and what's your name?}
nothing
{Caller: My name is Michael.}
{AloAi: Got it. And how urgent is this matter to you?}
nothing
{Caller: Very urgent!}
{AloAi: Noted, and may I have the name of your dental clinic?}
nothing
{Caller: Family Dentals}
{AloAi: Mhmm and what is the phoen number associated with your account?}
nothing
{AloAi: Okay great I have successfully opened your ticket. Would you want someone from our team to give you a call back or do you want to be transferred to our tech support?}
{Caller: Yes please transfer me right away}
{AloAi: Sure let me transfer you right now to our tech support.}
